results.content: Very clear and concise explanations from Joris. I thought this course was excellent and now have a clear understanding of SCSS and SASS.
results.content_html: Very clear and concise explanations from Joris. I thought this course was excellent and now have a clear understanding of SCSS and SASS.

results.content: Good, easy to understand but we're supposed to learn SASS and he uses SCSS, which can be confusing sometimes (mostly for the expert part)
results.content_html: Good, easy to understand but we're supposed to learn SASS and he uses SCSS, which can be confusing sometimes (mostly for the expert part)

results.content:
Overall great course. The course is more an overview of SCSS (which has syntax differences with SASS). Short and sweet introduction that gives you exactly what you need to know. 

The lesson could be improved with more real-world applications for the exercises. I suggest they be accompanied with a basic HTML the same way the very first exercise was.
results.content_html:
Overall great course. The course is more an overview of SCSS (which has syntax differences with SASS). Short and sweet introduction that gives you exactly what you need to know.

The lesson could be improved with more real-world applications for the exercises. I suggest they be accompanied with a basic HTML the same way the very first exercise was.

results.content:
I've been doing CSS and programming for about 15yrs and in this course I learned tons of stuff.  It's a bit like CSS has become a programming language with SASS and if someone is coming in from a none programming background it might be a good place for them to start with the terminology like variables, functions, loops etc

I did however experience a lot of difficulty with setting up with Koala compiler the tutor uses, only intermittently working which causes problems when dealing with any code, because you can think it's yourself that's not getting it right. However Joris said about another program Prepros, which worked a treat. This is on Win10 64 bit.

Joris is very knowledgeable and enthusiastic about the subject. The course says 1 hr, but it's a lot more than that in essence, there's resources you can download and follow along and practice exercises.

I knocked off half a mark because the font was a little small for me, even at full screen and 1080p so had to squint a bit, but all in all a great course and I've learned a new skill ;-)

results.content:
Excellent and timely course for understanding the basics of SCSS. As the instructor cover a section I applied it to a real-life project I was busy on.
Would have liked to see a few real-life examples for the "Expert" section though.
Thank you Joris.

Thank you Joris.

results.content:
If you are already experienced in CSS, this course may be all you need to take the plunge into pre-processed CSS. Super concise and yet still covers all of the core mechanics of SASS/SCSS. I docked half a star simply because it could certainly use some real-world examples of how to apply the more advanced sections.

That being said, the big advantage of this course is the quick spin-up of SCSS implementation and syntax. If that's all you really want to know, this is the course for you. If however, you want more ideas on how leveraging SASS can speed your development time and enhance code maintenance, you may want to choose a different course -- or perhaps get this course as a quick primer on SASS and another for real-world application if you needed.

That being said, the big advantage of this course is the quick spin-up of SCSS implementation and syntax. If that's all you really want to know, this is the course for you. If however, you want more ideas on how leveraging SASS can speed your development time and enhance code maintenance, you may want to choose a different course -- or perhaps get this course as a quick primer on SASS and another for real-world application if you needed.

results.content: Quick, simple and efficient information. My only complain, however, is the small font/lack of zooming. Nevertheless, it is a great introductory course to SASS with exercises which help solidify the knowledge and encourage you to code along.
